nodes.text: Limi was a group of 3 Class-A cargo containers containing supplies, as part of a small Rebel outpost holding multiple A-wings and X-wings. A single TIE Fighter was dispatched to destroy the outpost as the fighters had no pilots. Utility Tugs T-XL attempted to scramble the pilots to the fighters but were destroyed by the TIE Fighter and all X-wings and A-wings were destroyed. The containers Limi, along with Vic were left as the final target.
